```{r Manipal}
library(leaflet)
library(magrittr)

MyMap <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  setView(74.7870, 13.3530, zoom = 14) %>% 
  addMarkers(74.7849, 13.3533, popup = 'MAHE') %>%
  addMarkers(74.7873, 13.3529, popup = 'KMC') %>%
  addMarkers(74.7928, 13.3525, popup = 'MIT') %>%
  addMarkers(74.7856, 13.3429, popup = 'Lake')
MyMap
```
